portfolioItems.blurbText: building rich text editors for a social network
galleryTextItems: Worked on Faithlife.com, a social network for church communities.
Built front-end and back-end of new rich text editing feature for creating posts on site homepage with React, C#, and Less.
Ran user interview to get product feedback and wrote report for company CEO and VP of New Products.
Added new features such as downloading calendar items from email notifications and support for uploading new image types using C#, React, and RabbitMQ.
Improved, and tested user-facing UI components across the site using React, NUnit, and Less.

portfolioItems.blurbText: growing community as co-founder of the Yale Computer Society
galleryTextItems: Co-founded club and grew organization to ~30 members in a year

portfolioItems.blurbText: tic-tac-toe playing robots at the Social Robotics Lab
galleryTextItems: Built new automatic object detection system with C++ and OpenCV to replace old hard-coded system.
